headline: Ross Stores (ROST) Stock Slides as Market Rises: Facts to Know Before You Trade

headline: Ross Stores Looks Undervalued: Is Now the Time to Buy the Stock?
summary: ROST's strong off-price model and growth strategy make it attractive for long-term investors, though near-term headwinds could temper gains.

headline: 2 retail stocks that can weather volatility, analyst says
summary: Market volatility has emerged as a central theme of US President Trump's second term. CFRA Research equity research vice president Zachary Warring joins Catalysts with Madison Mills and RSM chief economist Joe Brusuelas to share two picks he thinks are well-positioned: Ross Stores (ROST) and Lululemon (LULU). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.
